channel.title: Couple of questions - Deltascape Source
channel.description:
Well, I've just got a couple of questions, so I'll get straight to 'em.
1. How would I go about adding in a ::commands and ::help menu in-game? Such as when I do ::commands, it makes a small menu pop up that says what commands there are and when I do ::help it makes a small window pop up explaining several different things.
2. How would I go about changing my Home, my home tele (it's currently a spell in the spellbook), and changing where players start at? My current home is in falador.
3. This is just a simple question, I was wondering if anyone had the tele coords for the Slayer Dungeon?
Sorry to waste anyones time on these questions.
Thanks for any help,
Clay.

item.title: Couple of questions - Deltascape Source
item.dc:creator: @King_Redrum King Redrum
item.description:
@King_Redrum wrote:

Alright, thanks for the help.

Read full topic

item.title: Couple of questions - Deltascape Source
item.dc:creator: @King_Redrum King Redrum
item.description:
@King_Redrum wrote:

Beautiful, but one more question… I’m clueless when it comes to finding a decent interface, much less one that isn’t being used, lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Couple of questions - Deltascape Source
item.dc:creator: @99skiller99 99skiller99
item.description:
@99skiller99 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("commands")) {
   showInterface(####);
   sM("You are now viewing the commands list!");
   }

1A.

if (command.startsWith("help")) {
   showInterface(####);
   sM("You are now viewing the help menu!");
   }
  1. Search the co-ordinates at which the teleport teleport’s you too, change them accordingly.

2A. Go into player.Java and search “toX” until you come across something like

toX = 3###+misc.random(3);
toY = 3###+misc.random(3);
  1. Idk lol.

Info:
For the ####'s in 1 and 1A, find an interface you like, and change it to that.

For the ###'s in the 2A I put those there because I could only remember the first numbers of the co-ordinates.

Read full topic
